original_text: A man called Jairus came to Jesus. He was a leader at the Jewish meeting place. When he saw Jesus, he went down on his knees in front of him.
korean_text: 회당장 중의 하나인 야이로라 하는 이가 와서 예수를 보고 발 아래 엎드리어

sentences.original_text: A man called Jairus came to Jesus.
He was a leader at the Jewish meeting place.
he went down on his knees in front of him.
